Reviews.Title: I like it enough to keep it
Reviews.Author: amanda
Reviews.Content: I loved it at first, then I noticed a few glitches but probably because it was a used phone.The mic is really sensitive and if you hold the phone a certain way when in call, the other line won't hear you.The camera quality isn't as nice as I expected, and the video doesnt work with instagram, but otherwise its fine.

Reviews.Title: software is out dated
Reviews.Author: mark purdy
Reviews.Content: Out dated software . Battery dies in only 2 hrs . Not much else to say , the bigest issue is out dated software !

Reviews.Title: Great phone with Android apps and high speed processor!
Reviews.Author: M.Smith "HarleyRider05"
Reviews.Content: One of the best phones I've owned.  Fast, reliable, perfect size and clear screen.  Gorilla glass is super scratch resistant.  Battery life is excellent, 1-2 days no problem.  T-mobile 4G speed is awesome and the dual core 1.6 ghz makes the apps run super fast.  You can swap batteries out easily with the push of a button the back pops right off.  Access to the SIM card and Micro SD memory is also easy under the back cover.  This is overall a great phone, one of the HTC top models.  I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: slow response touch screen
Reviews.Author: michelle dickinson
Reviews.Content: this phone has a lot of lag with a very slow response on the touch screen. And the music volume sucks!!!but the speed and picture quality is great. And!! its does not come with a memory card. and with out it i cant take a picture on load one thats bs.

Reviews.Title: Worst Battery Life!  (review of phone, not seller)
Reviews.Author: Christen Peterson
Reviews.Content: I had the battery fully charged and it would die within 5 min off the charger. I was careful with screen brightness/GPS and apps. I would not recommend this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: worst choice buying it from this seller.
Reviews.Author: Abdul
Reviews.Content: the phone keeps dying. The battery has been damaged. Turns off even when fully charged and when it is turned back on it has little to no battery life left.
